chapter.title: Exercise: Build a first SWT UI

section.title: TodoOverviewPart
section.para: Add a button to your TodoOverviewPart class. Besides the button add a label with the default text set to: "Data not available."
Attach a SelectionListener to the button. If the button is pressed, read the number of Todos from your ITodoService service and assign the number to the text of the label.
